0.1.0.name: connect20/Convertware_Adzones_Personalization
0.1.0.description: Convertware offers the ability to create custom zones in your Magento site for advertising messaging. As you'll see in the details to come, designs will be utilized to place a dynamic banner advertising messages that conform and adapt to the users coming to decide.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
